item.description: The Friends of the Myles Standish State Forest's Native Bird Support Group is looking for help on February 20th to stain 30 bluebird nest boxes. We are going to be putting them up in the forest in March when the bluebirds start to arrive for their real estate shopping. We will provide the tools and have pizza for a snack. We will be staining these boxes in a workshed, out of the elements, but it will still be cold so wear warm clothing. Meet at the forest headquarters in the parking lot near the ranger's station at 10:00. If there's bad weather, we will reschedule and post a cancellation the day before on this meetup site.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Birdhouse Staining Work Party
